articles.author: Tim Hardwick
articles.title: Apple's First Bezel-Free iPhone Unlikely to Be Ready for 2026 Launch - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple's plans to create an iPhone with a completely bezel-free display are reportedly facing significant technical challenges, with a new report...
articles.content: Apple's plans to create an iPhone with a completely bezel-free display are reportedly facing significant technical challenges, with a new report suggesting that the technology may not be ready by 202… [+2257 chars]
